Monday: It's gonna be a long five days...
Five days to eat so much spaghetti!
You're going to win so much this week, you're gonna get tired of winning!
Please, Mr. President, it's too much winning!
Tuesday: A sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises!
Just because we accept you as you are doesn't mean we've abandoned hope you'll improve!
We choose to go to the moon... not because it is easy, but because it is hard.
Why does February feel like one big Tuesday?
Three facts about Tuesday. The day after is not Friday, the day after that is not Friday, and the day after that is not even Friday.
Wednesday: "I am not a crook" - Richard Nixon
Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
It's arguably the worst day of the week.
Thursday: Do not pray for easy lives, gentlemen, pray to be stronger men.
Thirsty Thursday! Get out there and drink!
You've made it to Thursday, but your energy didn't.
The road less traveled usually has more potholes...
What the hell is even that?
You are a machine that turns homework into flunked exams!
Friday: Finish strong, it's almost the weekend!
You've made it through the week!
Give it your best shot today!
Ack! So much homework due today!
I am the Senate! - Emperor Palpatine
Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
Some people graduate with honors, but you're just honored to graduate.
Saturday: Rest and recharge for the week ahead.
Drink coffee with two straws for double the energy.
Set an alarm every 15 minutes because success never sleeps.
Sunday: Take a rest, recharge for the week ahead!
Prepare for the week with a fresh mind.
Sunday is a day of rest.
